sourcesContent:
<template>
<svg width="150" height="120" viewBox="0 0 120 80" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="empty-pie-svg">
  <g>
    <!-- 背景圆 -->
    <circle cx="45" cy="35" r="20" fill="#A0C4FF" opacity="0.25" />
    <!-- 动态占比扇形（用圆弧+stroke-dasharray动画） -->
    <circle
      class="pie-arc"
      cx="45" cy="35" r="20"
      fill="none"
      stroke="#4F8EF7"
      stroke-width="14"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-dasharray="125.66"
      stroke-dashoffset="0"
      transform="rotate(-90 45 35)"
    />
    <!-- 静态小扇形装饰 -->
    <path class="pie-static" d="M45,35 L65,35 A20,20 0 0,0 45,15 Z" fill="#FFB300" opacity="0.85" />
  </g>
</svg>
</template>

<script setup>
</script>

<style scoped>
.empty-pie-svg {
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
  animation: floatX 3.2s ease-in-out infinite;
}
.pie-arc {
  stroke-dasharray: 125.66;
  stroke-dashoffset: 100;
  opacity: 0.92;
  animation: pie-arc-anim 2.8s cubic-bezier(.4,1.6,.6,1) infinite;
}
.pie-static {
  transform-origin: 45px 35px;
  animation: pie-static-pop 2.2s cubic-bezier(.4,1.6,.6,1) infinite;
  animation-delay: 0.5s;
}
@keyframes pie-arc-anim {
  0% {
    stroke-dasharray: 10 125.66;
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
  20% {
    stroke-dasharray: 80 125.66;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  50% {
    stroke-dasharray: 125.66 0;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  80% {
    stroke-dasharray: 80 125.66;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  100% {
    stroke-dasharray: 10 125.66;
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
}
@keyframes pie-static-pop {
  0% { transform: scale(0.7); opacity: 0.5; }
  20% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 1; }
  60% { transform: scale(1.05); opacity: 1; }
  100% { transform: scale(0.7); opacity: 0.5; }
}
@keyframes floatX {
  0% { transform: translateY(0) translateX(0); }
  25% { transform: translateY(-8px) translateX(4px); }
  50% { transform: translateY(-12px) translateX(-4px); }
  75% { transform: translateY(-8px) translateX(4px); }
  100% { transform: translateY(0) translateX(0); }
}
</style>
